Text.val: 16.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Added BADT_IBAN to CSV
14.08.2012 JH SCR17500 Replaced activation of Excel via UFB577 with GB323 - ActivateExcel
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
21.10.2010 GB SCR15897 Extended condition for selection and changed
14.09.2006 JJ SCR11747 Cont. BNKA_CODETYPEACCOUNT changed from criteria to
28.08.2006 JJ SCR11747 Added selection on BNKA_CODETYPEACCOUNT

ExpSyntax.val: 'exists (select * from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/ADMN, '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/ADMU where ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE = s.BADT_BANK_ADMNO and ADMU_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE and ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_BANK = '&ASCIIChr (39)&'Y'&ASCIIChr (39)&' and ADMU_HUSR_ID = '&ASCIIChr (39)&User (0)&ASCIIChr (39)&')'

Text.val: Administration is not allowed if there is no row in ADMINISTRATION_USER

SQL_STMT_U.val: select s.BADT_BANK_ADMNO, s.BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO, s.BADT_BANKID, s.BADT_BANKACCOUNT, s.BADT_IBAN, s.BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT, s.BADT_BANK_CURRENCY, s.BADT_BALDAILYSTATEMENT, s.BADT_NUMDAILYSTATEMENT, b.BNKA_CODETYPEACCOUNT from :1/BADT s, :1/BNKA b where :3 and b.BNKA_BANK_ADMNO = s.BADT_BANK_ADMNO and b.BNKA_BANK_LEDG_NO = s.BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO and b.BNKA_BANKID = s.BADT_BANKID and b.BNKA_BANKACCOUNT = s.BADT_BANKACCOUNT and s.BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT = (select max( m.BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT) from :1/BADT m where m.BADT_BANK_ADMNO = s.BADT_BANK_ADMNO and m.BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO = s.BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO and m.BADT_BANKID = s.BADT_BANKID and m.BADT_BANKACCOUNT = s.BADT_BANKACCOUNT and m.BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT <= ':2') for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
